channelDescriptors.description: A channel that sends notifications via email.
channelDescriptors.name: projects/ditie-cloud-laboratorio/notificationChannelDescriptors/email

channelDescriptors.description: A channel that publishes notifications to Google Chat spaces.

labels.description: Google Chat space name, which is in the format 'spaces/{space}'

channelDescriptors.name: projects/ditie-cloud-laboratorio/notificationChannelDescriptors/google_chat

channelDescriptors.description: A channel that sends notifications via the third-party messaging service [PagerDuty](https://www.pagerduty.com/, "PagerDuty website"). This uses the "Generic API" service to push notifications

labels.description: The service key for interacting with the service. This field is obfuscated by returning only a few characters of the key when fetched.

channelDescriptors.name: projects/ditie-cloud-laboratorio/notificationChannelDescriptors/pagerduty

channelDescriptors.description: A channel that publishes notifications to Cloud Pub/Sub topics.
channelDescriptors.name: projects/ditie-cloud-laboratorio/notificationChannelDescriptors/pubsub

channelDescriptors.description: A channel that sends notifications to the third-party chat service [Slack](https://slack.com, "Slack web site").

labels.description: A permanent authentication token provided by Slack. This field is obfuscated by returning only a few characters of the key when fetched.
The Slack channel to which to post notifications.
The Slack team name. This label is for output only.

channelDescriptors.name: projects/ditie-cloud-laboratorio/notificationChannelDescriptors/slack

channelDescriptors.description: A channel that sends notifications via Short Message Service (SMS)

labels.description: A phone number to which to send notifications.

channelDescriptors.name: projects/ditie-cloud-laboratorio/notificationChannelDescriptors/sms

channelDescriptors.description: A channel that sends notifications to a webhook using HTTP-standard basic authentication. Basic authentication is usually used in conjunction with SSL/TLS to reduce the risk of attackers snooping the credentials. Basic authentication is defined in [RFC2617](http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2617.txt, "RFC 2617, HTTP Authentication").

labels.description: The password. The field is obfuscated when the channel is fetched.
The URL to which to publish the webhook.

channelDescriptors.name: projects/ditie-cloud-laboratorio/notificationChannelDescriptors/webhook_basicauth

channelDescriptors.description: A channel that sends notifications to a webhook using token authentication. Token authentication includes a shared secret as a query string parameter. Token authentication is usually used in conjunction with SSL/TLS to reduce the risk of attackers snooping the token.

labels.description: The URL to which to publish the webhook.

channelDescriptors.name: projects/ditie-cloud-laboratorio/notificationChannelDescriptors/webhook_tokenauth
